headline: C-Suite Solidarity
summary: So banks will have to comply with new rules that took effect June 21 requiring federal contractors to notify employees about their rights under the National Labor Relations Act. These include rights to "form, join, and support a union and to bargain collectively," according to the Labor Department. Maybe it's time for Jamie Dimon and Vikram Pandit to create a union that could strike to protest financial-overhaul legislation.
